## CURRENT EXHIBITIONS

[](https://societyillustrators.org/event/about-face/ "About Face: The 2025 Members’ Open Exhibition")

About Face: The 2025 Members’ Open Exhibition

[](https://societyillustrators.org/event/the-original-art-2025/ "The Original Art • 45th Annual Exhibition")

The Original Art • 45th Annual Exhibition

[](https://societyillustrators.org/event/something-else-entirely/ "Something Else Entirely: The Illustration Art of Edward Gorey")

Something Else Entirely: The Illustration Art of Edward Gorey

Thanks for helping the Society of Illustrators community thrive in 2025! With your support, we hosted **nearly 53,000 visitors** , a **15%** increase from 2024. Together, we celebrated illustration in all its forms through **11 exhibitions** and ****104 programs.****

We invite you to make a tax-deductible gift to help us expand our reach in 2026. Your donation of any amount ensures that the Society will continue to grow. Thank you and wishing you a joyful holiday season!

[MAKE A DONATION TODAY](https://societyillustrators.org/support-the-society/)

admission_text:
## HOURS AND ADMISSION

Timed ticketing is available. Walk-ins welcome! Prepare for your visit by learning about our [Ticket Policies and Safety Protocols …](https://societyillustrators.org/ticketsafety/)

**NEW HOURS:**  
**Monday:** Closed  
**Tuesday:** Closed  
**Wednesday:** 11:00am – 5:00pm  
**Thursday:** 11:00am – 5:00pm  
**Friday:** 11:00am – 5:00pm  
**Saturday:** 11:00am – 5:00pm  
**Sunday:** Closed

**128 Bar Hours (with admission):**  
**Wednesday – Saturday:** 11:00am – 5:00pm  
[Learn more…](https://societyillustrators.org/128-bar/)

**CLOSED: Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years Day.**

### ADMISSION:

Adults: | $18  
---|---  
Seniors (65+): | $12  
Students (full-time undergraduate and below with current ID): | $12  
Children (10 and under accompanied by an adult): | FREE  
Members and their guests: | FREE (with up to 4 guests)  
Group and School Rates: | [View options here.](https://societyillustrators.org/group-visits/)  
Wheelchair accessible: | FREE – only our first floor Main Gallery is accessible without using stairs  
  
[](https://museums4all.org/)

The Society is a proud participating Museum of [_Museums for All_](https://museums4all.org/), a national access program that encourages individuals of all backgrounds to visit museums regularly and build lifelong museum habits. Through _Museums for All_ , those receiving food assistance (SNAP benefits) can gain free or reduced admission to more than 700 museums throughout the United States simply by p...
